description: Best Western Plus Centurion Hotel is a great choice for a stay in Radstock. Guests can visit the spa to indulge in hot stone massages, facials, or body treatments, and Modern European cuisine is served at The Restaurant @Centurion, which is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. 2 bars/lounges and an indoor pool are other highlights at this upscale hotel, and rooms offer flat-screen TVs and room service.

DESCRIPTION.value: Best Western Plus Centurion Hotel is a great choice for a stay in Radstock. Guests can visit the spa to indulge in hot stone massages, facials, or body treatments, and Modern European cuisine is served at The Restaurant @Centurion, which is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. 2 bars/lounges and an indoor pool are other highlights at this upscale hotel, and rooms offer flat-screen TVs and room service.

HOTEL_AMENITY.value:
In addition to a full-service spa, Best Western Plus Centurion Hotel features an indoor pool and a spa tub. The hotel offers a restaurant. Guests can unwind with a drink at one of hotel's 2 bars/lounges. Public areas are equipped with complimentary high-speed wireless Internet access.

This eco-friendly hotel also offers a fitness center, a sauna, and multilingual staff. Complimentary self parking is available on site.

Best Western Plus Centurion Hotel is a smoke-free property.

DINING.value:
Full breakfasts are available for a surcharge and are served each morning between 7 AM and 10 AM.
The Restaurant @Centurion - Overlooking the golf course and garden, this restaurant specializes in Modern European cuisine and serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Guests can enjoy drinks at the bar. A children's menu is available. Open daily.
Jays Bar - This bar specializes in British cuisine and serves lunch, dinner, and light fare.
Room service (during limited hours) is available.

RECREATION.value:
An indoor pool and a spa tub are on site. Other recreational amenities include a sauna and a fitness center.

The recreational activities listed below are available either on site or nearby; fees may apply.

CHECK_IN_POLICY.value:
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

NEARBY_POINTS_OF_INTEREST.value:
Radstock Museum - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Downside Abbey - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Farrington Park Golf Club - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Nunney Castle - 9.9 km / 6.1 mi
Kilver Court - 10.6 km / 6.6 mi
Bath Spa University - 11.3 km / 7 mi
Bath City Farm - 12.1 km / 7.5 mi
Stanton Drew Stone Circle - 12.5 km / 7.8 mi
Alexandra Park - 13.2 km / 8.2 mi
Saltford Golf Club - 13.3 km / 8.3 mi
Prior Park Landscape Garden - 13.6 km / 8.5 mi
Bath Mission Theater - 13.7 km / 8.5 mi
SouthGate Bath - 13.7 km / 8.5 mi
Chapel Arts Centre - 13.8 km / 8.6 mi
Herschel Museum of Astronomy - 13.8 km / 8.6 mi

The preferred airport for Best Western Plus Centurion Hotel is Bristol (BRS-Bristol Intl.) - 20.2 km / 12.5 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

HCOM_SPA.value:
Green Apple has 2 treatment rooms. Services include hot stone massages, Swedish massages, massages, and facials. A variety of treatment therapies are provided, including aromatherapy and reflexology. The spa is equipped with a sauna and a spa tub.

The spa is open select days.

LOCATION_TEASER.value:
Location
Situated in the historical district, this spa hotel is 1.7 mi (2.8 km) from Radstock Museum and 2.1 mi (3.3 km) from Downside Abbey. Kilver Court and Nunney Castle are also within 9 mi (15 km).

AWARDS_AND_AFFILIATIONS.value:
Green / Sustainable Property
This property participates in Green Tourism Program, a program that measures the property's impact on one or more of the following: environment, community, cultural-heritage, the local economy.

NATIONAL_RATING.value: This establishment has received its official star rating from VisitEngland, the National Tourist Board for England.

KNOW_BEFORE_YOU_GO.value:
• Reservations are required for massage services and spa treatments. Reservations can be made by contacting the hotel prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation.
  • The property has connecting/adjoining rooms, which are subject to availability and can be requested by contacting the property using the number on the booking confirmation.

FEES.value:
The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.


  • Fee for full breakfast: GBP 14.75 per person (approximately)
  • Rollaway bed fee: GBP 25 per night

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

ACCESSIBILITY_OPTION.value: To make requests for specific accessibility needs, complete the "Special or Accessibility Requests" section of "Trip Preferences" when you book your hotel.

TAGLINE.value: 4-star hotel in Radstock with 2 bars/lounges, spa
